explains: adj. 准军事的；辅助军事的

sentences.en: Searches by the army and paramilitary forces have continued today.
sentences.cn: 军队和准军事部队的搜索今天仍然继续着。

sentences.en: The soldiers were deployed to help paramilitary police seal the border.
sentences.cn: 这些士兵们被调去协助准军事警察封锁边境。

sentences.en: Yesterday, RioZoo launched a competition on Twitter to find the paramilitary boa constrictor a new name.
sentences.cn: 昨天，RioZoo 在 Twitter 上发起了为这条准军事化南美巨蟒的争名竞赛。
